title: description
Jason Derulo & Snoop Dogg's Queen Bee: A hot mix between the Queen Bee and the Picon. As hot as Jason Derulo & Snoop Dogg's mama.

title: notes
Jason Derulo & Snoop Dogg's Queen Bee: Gin, Curacao and a dash of something.

title: pairing
Jason Derulo & Snoop Dogg's Queen Bee: Jason Derulo & Snoop Dogg have it with an o Sauterne and strudel.

title: serving_suggestion
Jason Derulo & Snoop Dogg's Queen Bee: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the o sounds of Wiggle.
